name: AFK Gamer Lounge
blurb: Video Games + Beer + Friends = AFK Gamer Lounge

rewards.reward:
The 1-on-1
  ============================= 
•A 1-on-1 match in a video game of your choosing with an AFK Founder
  ============================= 
•1 Experience Point to level up AFK below

The 2-on-2
  ============================= 
•A 2-on-2 match vs AFK Founders  ==============================
•An "I beat the founders" laptop sticker if you win =============================    
•3 Experience Points

Brick Builder\r\n============================= \u2022Your name or username on a brick at AFK, part of a special "Thank You Kickstarter Backers" wall area ============================= \u20224 Experience Points
Cloth Armor\r\n ============================= \u2022Kickstarter-exclusive "Reported for AFK" T-Shirt  ============================= \u20225 Experience Points

AFK All-Access (Early Bird) ============================= \u2022AFK All-Access Pass ============================= \u202210 Experience Points to level up AFK with ============================= \u2022Everything at "Brick Builder" level\r\n=============================\r\n\u2022A "Reported for AFK" T-Shirt

AFK All-Access
  ============================= 
•AFK All-Access Pass ============================= •10 Experience Points to level up AFK with ============================= •Everything at "Brick Builder" level
=============================
•A "Reported for AFK" T-Shirt

GET LUCKY
============================= 
•3 months of AFK All-Access Pass ($150 worth)
============================= 
•20 Experience Points
============================= 
•Everything in "Brick Builder" and a T-Shirt

"Vault Dweller"\r\n  =============================\r\n\u20223 months of AFK All-Access Pass ($150 worth) ============================= \u202230 Experience Points ============================= \u2022A Kickstarter-exclusive "Reported for AFK" hoodie

Solo Queue =============================
•3 months of AFK All-Access Pass =============================
•60 Experience Points =============================
•A "Reported for AFK" T-Shirt =============================
•A 1 on 1 coaching session in any esports Title =============================
•All of the rewards of the "Brick Builder" level=============================
•All of the rewards of "The 1-on-1" level

Premade 5 =============================
•FIVE 2-Month AFK All Access Passes =============================
•20 Experience Points Each for 5 People =============================
•5 AFK Team T-Shirts with YOUR Team Logo/Name =============================
•A brick in AFK's wall with your team name or logo =============================
•A full team coaching session in any esports title =============================
•Play a 5v5 showdown match with AFK staff

I'll Take That One! =============================
•A Year's Worth of AFK All-Access Pass =============================
•200 Experience Points =============================
•One of Each Kickstarter Exclusive Hoodie & T-Shirt 
=============================
•Walk out of AFK with Any PC You Want, Yours to Keep! =============================
•Plus all of the rewards from "The 1-on-1" and "Brick Builder" tiers

The OG Ace Special ============================= 4x (3 month all-access passes) 4x ("Reported for AFK" T-Shirts) 4x (1 on 1 coaching sessions) 4x (Bricks with your name or username on them) and 4x (1-on-1 matches with the Founders of AFK) PLUS 10x (2-month all-access passes), 10x (AFK Team T-Shirts with your Team/Logo), 2x (team coaching sessions in any esports title), and 2x (5v5 showdown matches with AFK staff) and 440 Experience Points

Cake Party 
=============================
•We close down AFK for an afternoon or evening to host your ultimate gaming event with tournaments you control and AFK gear for all of your guests. There will be cake...really.
=============================
•There will be cake...really...
